result.title: Single Source Shortest Paths and All Pairs Shortest Paths
result.content:
It's natural to do session on Single Source Shortest Paths and All Pairs Shortest Paths after Dijkstra. This will cover Dijkstra, Bellman-Ford algorithm, Floyd-Warshall, everything about shortest paths :)

As with before, please recommend good tutorials, problems, etc.: there are much more problems with knowledge of SSSP and APSP, there are huge variety of problems that can be solved once you learn these algorithms. :)

And because we are combining 2 topics, this will be a 2-week session, as it is more appropriate.

Have fun!
